mapper.insert: MERGE INTO nol_ticket_date d USING ( SELECT #{tno} AS tno, TO_DATE(#{tdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS tdate FROM dual ) s ON (d.tno = s.tno AND d.tdate = s.tdate) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (tdno, tno, tdate, quantity) VALUES (nol_ticket_date_seq.NEXTVAL, s.tno, s.tdate, 1000)
mapper.select: SELECT quantity FROM nol_ticket_date WHERE tno = #{tno} AND tdate = TO_DATE(#{tdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
